channel.title: XP Lamps
channel.description: Hi i own a server and im having some trouble if any one here has advice on this problem or exact answer that'd be great. I decided i want to sell xp lamps in a store for max cash, as some of the skills are kind of slow, I would like to know what kind of command or if statement im going to use in my client.java and what interface is the xplamp im using a 317 delta source, and i would like the xp lamp to reward 1m xp per skill and use only once, Thanks, Owner Meeper

item.title: XP Lamps
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

I can’t tell you directly, the only advice I can give is search for a source that already has this, and study the code.

Read full topic
